name: Wrapped Bittensor (Universal)
description: uTAO is a wrapped implementation of TAO designed to enable trading and DeFi integrations across multiple blockchains. Bittensor is a decentralized network where computers work together to develop AI. Participants who contribute their compute power or AI models can earn TAO. TAO is the network's native token that rewards mining, validating, and staking. Universal is a cross-chain asset protocol that enables users to trade and utilize wrapped assets (uAssets) across multiple blockchains. uAssets are 1:1 backed representations of native cryptocurrencies, such as XRP, DOGE, and SUI, held in secure custody. This allows users to access and transact with assets that are not natively available on their preferred chains, without relying on bridges or centralized exchanges. Universal provides seamless trading, liquidity provision, and lending opportunities for uAssets, ensuring deep liquidity and security through institutional-grade custody and real-time proof of reserves.
